item.title: Lacanian Psychosis among pre-teen Tik-Tok users
item.description: By GPT3-3, Daniel Zautner ABSTRACT Lacan’s theory of psychosis in relation to the subject and the signifier is discussed in the context of the supposed epidemic of “Lacanian Psychosis” among pre-teen Tik-Tok users in the United States. The article will discuss the theory of the real, the subject, and the signifier in relation to psychosis. The article will also discuss the relationship of the signifier to the subject at the level of the ego in order to understand the strange behavior of pre-teen users of Tik-Tok.
